content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at position (-5.0, 2.5) with coal (refueled with 50 coal in step 33)
- Steam engine at position (0.5, 6.5)
- Connected with pipe groups for water flow:
  - PipeGroup with water at positions [(-8.5,-0.5),(-7.5,-0.5),(-6.5,0.5),(-7.5,0.5),(-5.5,0.5)]
- Steam pipe system at positions [(-3.5,3.5),(-3.5,2.5),(-2.5,5.5),(-3.5,5.5),(-3.5,4.5),(-2.5,6.5)]
- Currently producing approximately 300-340 water and 290-340 steam per minute

### Iron Production Line at (17.5, 72.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position (17.5, 72.5)
- Transport belt system:
  - Belt at position (17.5, 74.5) (replaced in step 32 and 36)
  - Belt at position (17.5, 75.5) (added in step 36)
  - Belt at position (18.5, 75.5) (added in step 36)
- Stone furnace at position (20.0, 75.0) with 50 coal
- Output inserter at position (21.5, 75.5)
- Wooden chest for iron plates at position (21.5, 76.5)
- Additional inserter at position (21.5, 77.5) to move plates from chest to belt
- Transport belt at position (21.5, 78.5) and (22.5, 78.5)
- Additional inserters for item movement:
  - Inserter at position (18.5, 77.5)
  - Inserter at position (19.5, 78.5)
- Additional wooden chest at position (18.5, 78.5)
- Connected to power grid with small electric poles

### Copper Production Line at (-47.5, 75.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at position (-47.5, 75.5)
- Transport belt system:
  - Belt at position (-47.5, 77.5) (replaced in steps 32-34)
  - Belt at position (-46.5, 77.5) (replaced in step 34)
- Stone furnace at position (-48.0, 79.0) with 50 coal
- Input inserter at position (-46.5, 78.5)
- Output inserter at position (-46.5, 80.5)
- Wooden chest for copper plates at position (-46.5, 81.5) containing 103 copper ore
- Additional wooden chest at position (-45.5, 80.5)
- Additional inserter at position (-45.5, 81.5) for further transport
- Transport belt at position (-44.5, 81.5)
- Connected to power grid with small electric poles

### Copper Cable Assembly Line at (25.5, 80.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (25.5, 80.5) with copper cable recipe
- Input inserter at position (23.5, 80.5)
- Output inserter at position (27.5, 80.5)
- Wooden chest for copper cables at position (28.5, 80.5)
- Connected to power grid with small electric poles

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line at (35.5, 80.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position (35.5, 80.5) with electronic circuit recipe
- Copper cable input inserter at position (33.5, 80.5)
- Iron plate input inserter at position (35.5, 78.5)
- Output inserter at position (37.5, 80.5)
- Wooden chest for electronic circuits at position (38.5, 80.5)
- Connected to power grid with small electric poles

##
